Description.Text: Room With a View is a contemporary 4-star property offering modern apartment-style accommodation in the heart of Reykjavik. Highlights include a sauna free Wi-Fi and stunning panoramic city and sea views. Reykjavik is the capital and largest city of Iceland. It is the centre of culture and life of the Icelandic people as well as being one of the focal points of tourism in Iceland. The city centre is a very small area characterised by eclectic and colourful houses, with good shopping, dining and drinking. Nearby places of interest include the Port of Reykjavik, Reykjavik Cathedral and the Tjornin. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Reykjavik destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise building with a minimalist facade. Facilities include a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Studios sleep up to two people and showcase a contemporary decor. They comprise a sitting area and a well-equipped kitchenette. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, stereo and tea and coffee equipment. Light housekeeping is provided on a daily basis. Every studio and apartment contains all the equipment needed to cook individual meals. There are also plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite. The hotel offers an airport shuttle service.
